Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: elle18
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights upgraded terrace stay hotel rate facilities ideal spacious sparse clean adequate stay hotel slightly town getting centre town hotel 5 minutes les corts metro station green line 15 minutes las ramblas looking reasonably priced hotel dont mind metro town highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Business travellers could do better”
Reviews.Author: KAlcorn
Reviews.Content: hotel convenient camp nou stadium business traveller drawbacks internet access expensive 10c minute hotel supply iron instead charged expensive laundry service short careful looking prices hotel bargain easily incur 25 euros day extra costs time paid breakfast internet access lack restaurants immediate vicinity hotel visiting attend congress ccib nearly hour

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location for the City and Football”
Reviews.Author: RC6670
Reviews.Content: 1st trip barcelona hotel exceptionally priced 150 yards nou camp comfortable staff helpful indeed speaking languages trouble chance game football lucky tickets barca win 53 lionel scoring breaking 2 records time didnt eat restaurant due football breakfast eat loads varieties food guests saying evening meal definitely coming staying hotel

Reviews.Title: “great location if you are going to camp nou”
Reviews.Author: bbeerbower
Reviews.Content: spent night attending barca football game couldnt location camp nou front hotel 2 blocks entrance gates depending gate access 3 4 blocks metro les corts 4 blocks restaurants les corts shopping center taller de tapas tapas chain street 1 block camp nou nice restaurants hotel nice clean comfortable beds staff friendly helpful efficient location cant beat attending late night game concert camp nou holds people walking distance real plus waiting line metro definitely stay night concert game camp nou 107 euros booked 2 months advance 134 euros booked 2 wks prior

Reviews.Title: “Great City Weekend”
Reviews.Author: Jonathan_Dominique
Reviews.Content: barcelona city loved location hotel camp nou football fans stadium tour swimming pool roof hotel excellent views football stadium clean comfortable balcony spent evenings la rambla 10 minutes metro metro station minutes walk road las ramblas resturants shops nightlife park guell sight visit originally based english garden city meant residential estate strange city park barcelona zoo aswell zoos lol

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shellc1
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights husbands birthday recommend hotel bathroom walk shower front hotel traffic noise metro short walk easy barcelona nou camp 510 min walk hotel bar 2 min walk hotel called owners lovely feel welcome stay hotel
